description:
Difftastic is a structural diff tool that compares files based on their syntax.


Difftastic is a structural diff tool that understands syntax. See the manual to get started, and the changelog for historical changes.Diffing
Fixed a crash (introduced in 0.59) when the final changed hunk included the last line of the file.Display
Fixed an issue where files with no common content would show duplicate hunks.Fixed a performance issue when files had extremely long lines (e.g. 100,000+ characters).
